a5088300-a90f-4429-a35e-6bcbb124195f.description: Upon completion of our virtual SkillsCamp on conflict resolution, the badge earner will be able to: 1) categorize different types of conflicts and conflict styles, 2) Identify their own conflict style and how to communicate it, 3) Understand exactly how brain psychology is connected to conflict, 4) Use real, practical strategies for preventing and resolving conflict, 5) Apply a tried model for how to communicate effectively during conflicts, and more.
a5088300-a90f-4429-a35e-6bcbb124195f.name: Conflict Resolution with SkillsCamp

issuer.summary: issued by SkillsCamp Soft Skills Training

badge_template_activities.title: Learners were required to complete all interactive and/or video modules in the conflict resolution course. These consisted of topics on theories and practical content such as understanding conflict styles, how to respond to conflict and manage ego, techniques to resolve conflict, and more.
The learner will have shown understanding of the course material by completing various quizzes and assessments based on the content provided.

The learner was given a workbook to be completed alongside the course. In this workbook, they completed many practical activities such as: responding from the adult ego state, a conflict styles assessment,  using the "P.R.I.S.S method" to prevent conflict, and more.

bc47bcc1-b13b-4a8d-bf27-eae82dc943d2.description: Upon completion of our virtual SkillsCamp on conflict resolution, the badge earner will be able to: 1) Explain how much stress actually costs and what it can do to every part of the body and mind, 2) Understand exactly how the biology of the brain can lead to stress and how to use the same biology to calm down the stress. 3) Understand different ways people react to stress, 4) Identify their own leading stress driver (of 5), and 5) Apply real strategies for preventing and managing your stress.
bc47bcc1-b13b-4a8d-bf27-eae82dc943d2.name: Stress Management with SkillsCamp

issuer.summary: issued by SkillsCamp Soft Skills Training

badge_template_activities.title: Learners were required to complete all interactive and/or video modules in the conflict resolution course. These consisted of topics on theories and practical content such as the biology of stress, the causes of stress, coping strategies, and more.
The learner will have shown understanding of the course material by completing various quizzes and assessments based on the content provided.

The learner was given a workbook to be completed alongside the course. In this workbook, they completed many practical activities such as: "The 5 drivers of stress", techniques to manage stress, switching into optimism, coping strategies, and more.

954afd59-98f5-4131-83f4-24cfa1711995.description: Upon completion of our virtual SkillsCamp on conflict resolution, the badge earner will be able to: 1) Identify their own blind spots and how to seek feedback on them, 2) Explain how the brain can sometimes prevent us from hearing feedback that could actually help us, 3) Reframe feedback and look at things more optimistically, 4) Implement strategies to more effectively give and receive feedback, 5) Apply a tried and tested 4-part model for giving feedback more effectively, and more.
954afd59-98f5-4131-83f4-24cfa1711995.name: Mastering Feedback with SkillsCamp

issuer.summary: issued by SkillsCamp Soft Skills Training

badge_template_activities.title: Learners were required to complete all interactive and/or video modules in the mastering feedback course. These consisted of topics on theories and practical content such as the psychological feedback blockers, strategies for seeking and receiving feedback, the SBI-A model for giving feedback, and more.
The learner will have shown understanding of the course material by completing various quizzes and assessments based on the content provided.

The learner was given a workbook to be completed alongside the course. In this workbook, they completed many practical activities such as: "Giving Feedback Using the SBI-A Feedback Model", "Johari's Window" exercise, and more.

0ddbe009-dda9-490a-b44c-444a8c23a8b8.description: Upon competition of our virtual SkillsCamp on conflict resolution, the badge earner will be able to: 1) Understand the importance of EI in both the personal and professional context. 2) More accurately assess the emotions of others and respond accordingly. 3)Build stronger relationship more quickly. 4) Understand 4 EI domains: self-awareness, self-regulation, social awareness, and relationship management.
0ddbe009-dda9-490a-b44c-444a8c23a8b8.name: Emotional Intelligence with SkillsCamp

issuer.summary: issued by SkillsCamp Soft Skills Training

badge_template_activities.title: Learners were required to complete all interactive and/or video modules in the emotional intelligence course. These consisted of topics on theories and practical content such as the laws of emotional intelligence, understanding optimism vs pessimism, relationship management and empathy
The learner will have shown understanding of the course material by completing various quizzes and assessments based on the content provided.

The learner was given a workbook to be completed alongside the course. In this workbook, they completed many practical activities such as my beliefs identifier, identifying emotions in others, and more.
